name: Rachael_Ray_Porcelain_II_Red_Gradient_Nonstick_12-piece_Set_with_30_Mail-in_Rebate
reviews: Gave them to my son and his family for Christmas, Christmas morning I got this text from him "Best pans ever... Thank u.... Merry Christmas

If you are considering purchasing, you should know that they can't soak, not that they need to, and you can't use dishwasher tabs if you put them in the dishwasher. They work great, but still have to use spray when cooking eggs, but you can't use spray on the cookie sheets. One of the pot kids fits the large fry pan, but no lid for the small one. Good quality overall. I've used the set a lot and I'm pleased with my purchase.
Bought them for my son-in-law and he loves them! The pop of color gets him excited to cook and the quality of the materials is also good.
Bought this for my wife who loves it. Food never sticks making clean up quick & easy.
Bought these as a Christmas gift, they loved them
These are great quality with a great price tag!
I love my new set, cooks well, looking for more of her brand to buy!!
So far, everything is great. I have used almost all pieces... Love the cookie sheets... pans make great fried eggs... If they hold up, as I think they will, no complaints!
Easy to manipulate (size, handles), and clean.
Have used them now for awhile. Like the non-stick pans. Made lots of Christmas candy with them. They heat evenly and are easy to clean.
Great cookware...perfect for the real cook. No burn handles and see through lids
Love them. Be careful though they do scratch.
I purchased the Red Rachael Ray pot and pan set.they are light and durable and a joy to have in my kitchen. They clean up easily.
Pleased with product and enjoying it
This was a set for my mother for Christmas. All she said was thanks so I just gave an average rating.Guess I'll wait until she tells me any different.
love it no stick easy to wash no mess or scratching surface price was right on
description: Cook with confidence with this porcelain 12-piece nonstick cookware set that combines both style and function from renowned television personality and chef Rachael Ray. Ideal for both beginning cooks and experienced chefs alike, this set includes everything you need to make delicious meals in a stylish red gradient finish to add a pop of color to your kitchen.12-piece porcelain cookware set featured in gradient red adds a stylish pop of color to your kitchenNonstick coating provides both convenient cooking and cleaningRubberized nonslip handles aid in safetyFeatures an oven-safe temperature up to 500 degrees for easy pan-to-oven cookingRequires hand-wash careOven Safe to 350 - 500 FahrenheitColor: Red gradientNumber of pieces: 12 Surface: NonstickMaterials: PorcelainHandle attachment: RubberizedCare instructions: Hand washOven-safe to: 350-500 degrees Fahrenheit 1-quart covered saucepan2-quart covered saucepan6-quart covered stockpot8.5-inch skillet10-inch skillet3-quart covered sauteTwo (2) 10 inch x 15 inch Rachael Ray cookie pans with orange silicone gripsMaterialPorcelainTypeSetsSet Include12 PieceCare InstructionHand WashColorRed
